_meta.disclaimer: This content provides general legal information about landlord compliance obligations in England. It is not a substitute for professional legal advice. Always verify current requirements at legislation.gov.uk.

requirements.title: Gas Safety Certificate (CP12)
requirements.description: Annual gas safety check by a Gas Safe registered engineer. Certificate must be provided to tenants within 28 days of the check and before they move in.
requirements.penalty: Unlimited fine and/or up to 6 months imprisonment

requirements.title: Energy Performance Certificate (EPC)
requirements.description: Valid EPC with minimum rating of E. Must be provided to tenants before they move in. Valid for 10 years.

requirements.title: Electrical Installation Condition Report (EICR)
requirements.description: Electrical safety inspection every 5 years by a qualified electrician. Report must be provided to tenants within 28 days.
requirements.legal_reference: Electrical Safety Standards in the Private Rented Sector (England) Regulations 2020

requirements.title: Deposit Protection
requirements.description: Tenant deposit must be protected in a government-approved scheme within 30 days of receipt. Prescribed information must be provided to the tenant.
requirements.penalty: Compensation of 1-3x deposit amount; restrictions on recovering possession

requirements.title: How to Rent Guide
requirements.description: The current version of the government's 'How to Rent' guide must be provided to tenants at the start of every new tenancy.
requirements.penalty: Non-compliance may weaken landlord's position in possession proceedings

requirements.title: Smoke and Carbon Monoxide Alarms
requirements.description: Working smoke alarms on every floor. Carbon monoxide alarms in rooms with fixed combustion appliances (excluding gas cookers). Test at the start of each tenancy.
requirements.legal_reference: Smoke and Carbon Monoxide Alarm (Amendment) Regulations 2022

requirements.title: Right to Rent Checks
requirements.description: Verify immigration status of all adult tenants before granting tenancy. Keep copies of documents. Follow-up checks required for time-limited immigration permissions.
requirements.penalty: Civil penalty up to £3,000 per tenant; potential criminal offence

requirements.title: Legionella Risk Assessment
requirements.description: Assess risk of legionella bacteria in water systems. Not a legal requirement for a formal assessment, but landlords have a duty of care under health and safety law.
requirements.legal_reference: Health and Safety at Work Act 1974; HSE Approved Code of Practice L8
requirements.penalty: Prosecution under health and safety legislation

requirements.title: Fire Safety Compliance
requirements.description: Ensure furniture meets fire safety regulations. Provide fire escape routes in HMOs. Fire doors, extinguishers, and fire blankets where required.
requirements.legal_reference: Furniture and Furnishings (Fire Safety) Regulations 1988; Regulatory Reform (Fire Safety) Order 2005

requirements.title: Landlord Licensing (Where Applicable)
requirements.description: Mandatory HMO licence for properties with 5+ tenants forming 2+ households. Additional and selective licensing may apply in your local authority area.
